title: Custody
description: Encrypted design files have been stolen, requiring careful handling of digital evidence.

scenes.narrative: The breach occurred in a secure data vault. The files were encrypted but the thief had the keys.

choices.label: Interview vault personnel about access procedures.
choices.consequence: Personnel reveal how the thief obtained legitimate access credentials.

choices.label: Trace the encryption key usage in system logs.
choices.consequence: Logs show the key was used from an unauthorized location.

choices.label: Deploy decryption tools to recover the files.
choices.consequence: Tools successfully recover the encrypted files from backup systems.

choices.label: The vault access feels too clean - check for internal compromise.
choices.consequence: You discover an insider who provided the encryption keys.

scenes.narrative: The files have been partially decrypted, revealing the scope of the theft. Custody procedures must be followed precisely.

choices.label: Coordinate with legal team for proper evidence handling.
choices.consequence: Legal coordination ensures the evidence is admissible in court.

choices.label: Verify file integrity and chain of custody.
choices.consequence: Integrity checks confirm the files haven't been tampered with further.

choices.label: Secure the files with additional encryption layers.
choices.consequence: Additional security prevents further unauthorized access.

choices.label: The custody routing is wrong - no signature on the track.
choices.consequence: You uncover that the files were routed through unauthorized channels.
